java/liquibase/change/RawSQLChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00004 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00005 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00006 
00007 import java.util.Set;
00008 
00013 public class RawSQLChange extends AbstractSQLChange {
00014 
00015     private String comments;
00016     public RawSQLChange() {
00017         super("sql", "Custom SQL");
00018     }
00019 
00020     public RawSQLChange(String sql) {
00021         this();
00022         setSql(sql);
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getComments() {
00026         return comments;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public void setComments(String comments) {
00030         this.comments = comments;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00034         return "Custom SQL executed";
00035     }
00036 
00037     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00038         Element sqlElement = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("sql");
00039         sqlElement.appendChild(currentChangeLogFileDOM.createTextNode(getSql()));
00040 
00041         return sqlElement;
00042     }
00043 
00044 
00045     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00046         return null;
00047     }
00048 }
